[File: aptos-move/framework/src/natives/account.rs] [Function: native_create_address()] [Verification bypass] Can transactions with invalid bytecode that calls create_address bypass Move's bytecode verifier and execute unverified code? (Critical)

[File: aptos-move/framework/src/natives/account.rs] [Function: native_create_address()] [State bloat] Can repeated calls to create_address with different inputs cause state bloat in AptosDB by creating unnecessary address mappings? (Medium)

[File: aptos-move/framework/src/natives/account.rs] [Function: native_create_address()] [Block time manipulation] Can transactions with many create_address calls extend block execution time beyond safe limits, degrading validator performance? (Medium)
